name: Pathfinder First Edition
description: An evolution of the 3.5 edition d20 System, Pathfinder RPG is a tabletop fantasy role-playing game.

core_mechanics.skill_system: Consolidated skill list with ranks and ability modifiers
core_mechanics.armor_class: 10 + Dex modifier + armor bonus + shield bonus + other modifiers
core_mechanics.combat_maneuver: Combat Maneuver Bonus (CMB) and Combat Maneuver Defense (CMD)

character_creation.race: Choose your character's race with racial traits
character_creation.class: Select a class with unique class features and progression
character_creation.ability_scores: Use point buy, standard array, or rolling methods
character_creation.skills: Allocate skill ranks based on class and intelligence
character_creation.feats: Gain feats at 1st level and every odd level thereafter
character_creation.traits: Select character traits for additional customization

supported_features: Skill checks with consolidated skill system
Combat with combat maneuvers and flanking
